attributes.action: Stop the opening of more Betting & Loan shops in Walworth
attributes.additional_details:
Young people want to stop more betting and loan shops opening on the Walworth Road because they have a detrimental effect on the community.

We, the undersigned are concerned young people, who urge our councilors to act now to stop opening any more betting and loan shops on the Walworth Road. We recommend that this is to be included in the saturation policy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
